QuestData.Title: WANTED: Kliaa's Stinger
QuestData.Description: Posted by: Dyuna$B$BA vicious queen swamplighter has made the northern forests of Shadowmoon its home.$B$BUnfortunately, this poisonous pest terrorizes the forest between Embaari Village and Shattrath. As local traders put their lives at risk, prices of goods will continue to rise.$B$BAnyone who can put an end to the beast should detach its stinger as proof and bring it to Dyuna in Embaari Village. The merchant traders will reward generously.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Kliaa and bring its stinger to Dyuna at Embaari Village.
QuestData.CompletionText: Word around town is you've been hunting Kliaa. Any luck?
QuestData.RewardText: By the elders of Karabor... that thing is huge!$B$BOur trade routes will be safe once again. Well... as safe as you can be running through the northern forests.$B$BWell done, $c!
